title: Worcester Telegram : Local News, Politics & Sports in Worcester, MA
text:
Two at the top: Askren sisters go back-to-back as Clinton High valedictorians

For the second consecutive year, a member of the Askren family will step forward during Clinton High School's annual graduation ceremony.
